UNAUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to perform this action.
ACCOUNT_INACTIVE: Your account has been locked. Please contact the administrator for help.
ACCOUNT_LOCK: Your account has been suspended from the system due to logging in incorrectly too many times. Please contact the administrator for help.
USER_NOT_FOUND: The specified email could not be found.
INVALID_GRANT_TYPE: The provided grant type is invalid.
FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to access this resource.
SAME_PASSWORD: The new password cannot be the same as the old password.
